Testimonial.description: See what our students have to say about our product.

testimonials1.name: Lisa Suryani
testimonials1.text: With Guru AI, learning a new language becomes more fun. The translation is very accurate and helps me understand foreign languages.

testimonials1.name: Siti Nurhaliza
testimonials1.text: Translation and grammar make learning a language easier and more fun. It really helped me in deepening my understanding of the language.

testimonials2.name: Ayu Lestari
testimonials2.text: Guru AI is awesome! I can learn by listening and get the correct translation into my chosen language. The grammar explanations are also very helpful. Highly recommended!

testimonials2.name: Rina Andriani
testimonials2.text: With Guru AI, learning a new language becomes more fun. The translation was very accurate and the grammar explanations helped me understand the foreign language.

testimonials3.name: Nina Kartini
testimonials3.text: Guru AI really helped me understand English better. The explanation is very easy to understand and very informative. I highly recommend this product!

testimonials3.name: Wahyu Setiawan
testimonials3.text: Learning English becomes easier with Guru AI. The explanation is clear and easy to understand. This product really helped me in improving my language skills.

FAQ.description: Looking to learn more about Guru AI? Here are some of the most common questions we get asked. If you have additional questions, please feel free to

faqList.question: What is Guru AI?
faqList.answer: Guru AI Teacher Language Speech provides AI-based language and speech recognition services to help users improve their language skills.

faqList.question: Can I choose my AI teacher?
faqList.answer: Yes, you can select from a variety of AI teachers, each specializing in different voice.

faqList.question: What languages are available?
faqList.answer: Guru AI currently supports 3 language options: Indonesian, English and Japanese. We will be adding more languages in the future.

faqList.question: How does Guru AI help with language learning?
faqList.answer: Guru AI provides interactive conversations in the language of your choice, helping you practice grammar, listening and comprehension skills.

faqList.question: Does Guru AI support text-to-speech?
faqList.answer: Yes, Guru AI includes text-to-speech functionality, allowing you to hear the correct pronunciation of words and sentences in the language you are learning.

faqList.question: How does the credits system work?
faqList.answer: You purchase credits which can be used to access various features of Guru AI, such as initiating conversations with the AI assistant.

faqList.question: How many credits do I need to start a conversation?
faqList.answer: The number of credits required one to start a conversation depends on the number of messages you send.

faqList.question: What is Midtrans?
faqList.answer: Midtrans is a secure payment gateway that allows you to make safe and easy transactions when purchasing credits or other services within Guru AI.

BuyCredits.description: Want to improve your language skills? Then, consider buying some credits for Guru AI. With credits, you can unlock our powerful AI services and speed up your language learning journey. Join the thousands of learners who already trust AI Language Teacher.
